citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1213 on
20-Jun-17. We went to the house and knocked on the door. A relative answered. She didn't know where the
licensee was at and advised me to call his phone. I called the licensee up. He was unavailable for inspection. I
told him we would try back another time.
End of report.
Additional Inspectors
Sime Debra, Veterinary Medical Officer

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1213 on
20-Jun-17.  We went to the house and knocked on the door.  A relative answered.  She didn't know where the
licensee was at and advised me to call his phone.  I called the licensee up.  He was unavailable for inspection.  I
told him we would try back another time.
End of report.
Additional Inspectors
Sime Debra, Veterinary Medical Officer
